snippet: The decision by a Miami judge, issued on Feb. 26, said that the former Salvadoran defense minister should be deported because of his involvement in a number of human rights violations.
lead_paragraph: The decision by a Miami judge, issued on Feb. 26, said that the former Salvadoran defense minister should be deported because of his involvement in a number of human rights violations.

headline.main: The Ruling on Gen. José Guillermo García

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
